## Checklist

- [ ] All commits follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) (`feat(scope):`, `fix(scope):`, etc.)
- [ ] PR Checks workflow passes (commitlint, skill validation)
- [ ] SKILL.md remains under 500 lines (if modified)

## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat` – New feature (minor version bump)
- [ ] `fix` – Bug fix (patch version bump)
- [ ] `docs` – Documentation only (no version bump)
- [ ] `ci` / `chore` – CI or maintenance (no version bump)
